facultyName: Bartlett School of Architecture, Building, Environmental Design and Planning
description: Register your interest in graduate study at UCLOur Master of Arts and Sciences degree will equip you with the critical skills and specialist knowledge to operate as an urbanist in today's global environment, collaborating across sectors to tackle urgent challenges and shape fairer cities.
duration: 1 year full time, 2 years part time, 5 years flexible
fees: FeesFull time - £18,000 Part time - £9,000  Programme also available on a modular (flexible) basis.
